articles.title: Former Mr Universe Bodybuilder Shaun Davis Dies At 57, Tributes Pour In - NDTV
articles.description: In his bodybuilding career, he won a string of titles including Mr Britain and Mr Europe before being named Mr Universe in 1996.
articles.content:
The late bodybuilder is survived by his partner Helen Burrows and their daughter.
Former Mr Universe bodybuilder Shaun Davis has died at the age of 57. In his bodybuilding career, he won a string of… [+2174 chars]
